A teenagerâ€™s â€œcheesyâ€ promposal has gone viral for all the right reasons. 
According to KWCH-TV , Shaedon Wedel, 18, decided to ask his best friendâ€™s little sister, Carlie Wittman, 15, to his senior prom. Carlie has Down syndrome. Can't wait for prom with this sweet gal ğŸˆğŸ˜ pic.twitter.com/z3Lc66YRW3

In a video posted to Facebook, Wedel arrives at the Wittmansâ€™ home wearing a T-shirt bearing the words, â€œI know Iâ€™m NACHO typical Dorito butâ€¦ Iâ€™m going to be CHEESY and ask: Will you go to prom with me?â€ 
â€œWill you go to prom with me?â€ Wedel asked in the video as he gave Carlie a bouquet of roses and a bag of Doritos. She happily said â€œYes!â€ 
The video quickly gained attention online, as did pictures of the promposal Wedel posted on Twitter. 
Wedel told KWCH, â€œEver since Iâ€™ve known her, sheâ€™s loved Doritos.â€ 
Wedel said he wasnâ€™t seeking attention when he asked Carlie to prom, but he has enjoyed seeing â€œpositivity coming out of it.â€ 
â€œI didnâ€™t do it for the publicity and stuff, I did it to make her happy,â€ Wedel said. â€œShe deserves a lot.â€ 
Wedel said Carlie has â€œbrought nothing but joy to my life.â€ 
â€œAnyone whoâ€™s ever around her, she makes them laugh. She always has a smile on her face. Sheâ€™s amazing,â€ Wedel said. 
Wedel told CBS News that another reason he wanted to ask his best friend Carsonâ€™s little sister to prom is because he thinks of the Wittmans as a second family. 
â€œThey have been so kind and nurturing to me,â€ he said.
